chat_history.message: Hello, my iPhone 12 is experiencing the following issue : Fat phone with impact. Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile, 

Our customer received a product in good condition even though he ordered perfect condition. According to our quality charter, the customer is entitled to a discount of 80 euros and we encourage you to validate this within 24 working hours or we will be forced to do so here at your expense.

As a reminder, photos of the item are available in the details section of this after-sales service.

Paul from Back Market.
